result.eng: Do the books have to be printed in Ireland?
result.ga: An gá na leabhair a chur i gcló in Éirinn
result.orig: An gá na leabhair a chur i gcló in Éirinn
result.html: An gá na leabhair a chur i gcló in ÉirinnDo the books have to be printed in Ireland?
result.ponchtml: An gá na leaḃair a ċur i gcló in ÉirinnDo the books have to be printed in Ireland?

result.eng: When do I need to make payment?
result.ga: Cathain is gá dom íocaíocht a dhéanamh
result.orig: Cathain is gá dom íocaíocht a dhéanamh
result.html: Cathain is gá dom íocaíocht a dhéanamhWhen do I need to make payment?
result.ponchtml: Caṫain is gá dom íocaíoċt a ḋéanaṁWhen do I need to make payment?

result.eng: We'll close the shop if necessary.
result.ga: Dúnfaidh muid an siopa más gá
result.orig: Dúnfaidh muid an siopa más gá
result.html: Dúnfaidh muid an siopa más gáWe'll close the shop if necessary.
result.ponchtml: Dúnfaiḋ muid an siopa más gáWe'll close the shop if necessary.

result.eng: It is necessary to be really careful.
result.html: Is gá a bheith fíorchúramachIt is necessary to be really careful.
result.ponchtml: Is gá a ḃeiṫ fíorċúramaċIt is necessary to be really careful.

result.eng: It is not necessary to say that... It goes without saying that...
result.html: Ní gá a rá goIt is not necessary to say that... It goes without saying that...
result.ponchtml: Ní gá a rá goIt is not necessary to say that... It goes without saying that...

result.eng: You don't need to wait till the end.
result.ga: Ní gá duit fanacht go dtí an deireadh
result.orig: Ní gá duit fanacht go dtí an deireadh
result.html: Ní gá duit fanacht go dtí an deireadhYou don't need to wait till the end.
result.ponchtml: Ní gá duit fanaċt go dtí an deireaḋYou don't need to wait till the end.

result.eng: You do not have to state your address but if you do, we will be able to reply personally.
result.ga: Ní gá duit seoladh a thabhairt ach má dhéanann tú amhlaidh beidh muid in ann freagra pearsanta a thabhairt
result.orig: Ní gá duit seoladh a thabhairt ach má dhéanann tú amhlaidh beidh muid in ann freagra pearsanta a thabhairt
result.html: Ní gá duit seoladh a thabhairt ach má dhéanann tú amhlaidh beidh muid in ann freagra pearsanta a thabhairtYou do not have to state your address but if you do, we will be able to reply personally.
result.ponchtml: Ní gá duit seolaḋ a ṫaḃairt aċ má ḋéanann tú aṁlaiḋ beiḋ muid in ann freagra pearsanta a ṫaḃairtYou do not have to state your address but if you do, we will be able to reply personally.

result.html: Tá gá agam leis anoisI need it now!
result.ponchtml: Tá gá agam leis anoisI need it now!

result.eng: They say every group needs somebody to blame.
result.ga: Deirtear go bhfuil gá le ceap milleáin ag gach grúpa
result.orig: Deirtear go bhfuil gá le ceap milleáin ag gach grúpa
result.html: Deirtear go bhfuil gá le ceap milleáin ag gach grúpaThey say every group needs somebody to blame.
result.ponchtml: Deirtear go ḃfuil gá le ceap milleáin ag gaċ grúpaThey say every group needs somebody to blame.

result.eng: Readers and listeners did not have to be consumers of news anymore but producers who were able to collect their own reports.
result.ga: Níor ghá gur thomhaltóirí nuachta iad an lucht léitheoireachta nó éisteachta a thuilleadh ach táirgeoirí a bheadh in inmhe a gcuid tuairiscí féin a bhailiú
result.orig: Níor ghá gur thomhaltóirí nuachta iad an lucht léitheoireachta nó éisteachta a thuilleadh ach táirgeoirí a bheadh in inmhe a gcuid tuairiscí féin a bhailiú
result.html: Níor ghá gur thomhaltóirí nuachta iad an lucht léitheoireachta nó éisteachta a thuilleadh ach táirgeoirí a bheadh in inmhe a gcuid tuairiscí féin a bhailiúReaders and listeners did not have to be consumers of news anymore but producers who were able to collect their own reports.
result.ponchtml: Níor ġá gur ṫoṁaltóirí nuaċta iad an luċt léiṫeoireaċta nó éisteaċta a ṫuilleaḋ aċ táirgeoirí a ḃeaḋ in inṁe a gcuid tuairiscí féin a ḃailiúReaders and listeners did not have to be consumers of news anymore but producers who were able to collect their own reports.

result.eng: You didn't need an editor anymore to practise your own version of the journalistic trade.
result.ga: Ní raibh aon ghá le heagarthóir a thuilleadh le do leagan féin de cheird na hiriseoireachta a chleachtadh
result.orig: Ní raibh aon ghá le heagarthóir a thuilleadh le do leagan féin de cheird na hiriseoireachta a chleachtadh
result.html: Ní raibh aon ghá le heagarthóir a thuilleadh le do leagan féin de cheird na hiriseoireachta a chleachtadhYou didn't need an editor anymore to practise your own version of the journalistic trade.
result.ponchtml: Ní raiḃ aon ġá le heagarṫóir a ṫuilleaḋ le do leagan féin de ċeird na hiriseoireaċta a ċleaċtaḋYou didn't need an editor anymore to practise your own version of the journalistic trade.

result.eng: Workers were needed to clear the land and to plant, harvest and carry the crops.
result.ga: Bhí gá le hoibrithe chun an talamh a ghlanadh agus na bairr a chur a bhaint agus a iompar
result.orig: Bhí gá le hoibrithe chun an talamh a ghlanadh agus na bairr a chur a bhaint agus a iompar
result.html: Bhí gá le hoibrithe chun an talamh a ghlanadh agus na bairr a chur a bhaint agus a iomparWorkers were needed to clear the land and to plant, harvest and carry the crops.
result.ponchtml: Ḃí gá le hoibriṫe ċun an talaṁ a ġlanaḋ agus na bairr a ċur a ḃaint agus a iomparWorkers were needed to clear the land and to plant, harvest and carry the crops.
